title: E5336Bs-2&Bs-6â€™s signal is weak and cannot register to 3G network
answer:
1.Please check local network condition, check whether there is 3G network which provided by telecom operator at the moment. Ensure you are not in some close environment. (You may check the signal strengthen by the icon  displayed on Web UI main page)

 

2. Please move E5336Bs-2&Bs-6 toward to window to get better signal

3. If the network condition is good but still cannot register, please try to reset E5336Bs-2&Bs-6 and try again

4. Sometimes E5336Bs-2&Bs-6 will be rejected by the operator for some reasons. Please reset E5336Bs-2&Bs-6 and check. If E5336Bs-2&Bs-6 still cannot camp on the network, please contact with your device provider.

5. Login Web UI to check whether E5336Bs-2&Bs-6 has been set to 2G only mode. If your E5336Bs-2&Bs-6 has been set to 2G only, please select the 3G only option in the drop down menu.
